Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard/Yellow Marsh Road Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Avatar Boulevard and Yellow Marsh Road.
Room.LongDescription: Yellow Marsh Road is a small road leading east from the intersection with Avatar Boulevard, which runs north and south. Yellow Marsh Road marks the southern end of the Avatar Ruins. To the south, you can see the Anthian Bridge, crossing over the river flowing into Lyanden Lake. Looking up, you can see a single cloud in the otherwise clear sky.
